law.text: KRS 452.210 to 452.330 apply to criminal or penal actions in Circuit and District Courts.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 303, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 467, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, to indicate the application of the sections referred to.
